com.palantir.giraffe.host

Interface HostAccessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuthenticatedHostAccessor<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SshHostAccessor

    public interface HostAccessor
    Provides access to a host by opening file systems and execution systems.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Host getHost()
      Returns the Host that this object makes accessible.
      HostControlSystem open()
      Opens a new host control system on this host.
      SystemRequest request()
      Returns the SystemRequest object used when opening new systems.

    • Method Detail

      • getHost

        Host getHost()
        Returns the Host that this object makes accessible.

      • request

        SystemRequest request()
        Returns the SystemRequest object used when opening new systems.

      • open

        HostControlSystem open()
                       throws IOException
        Opens a new host control system on this host. The returned system should be closed after use. It is implementation specific if multiple host control systems can be open for the same host at the same time.
        Returns:
        an open HostControlSystem
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while opening the system
